recipesJson.name: 3-2-1 Nutella
recipesJson.author: VenSyBoy
recipesJson.description:
Chocolate cream with sweetened hazelnuts.
This recipe looks as simple as its description but this flavourings make a really good Nutella flavour.

The king of this recipe is VTA Sweet Cream( now is my go to sweet cream), has a good vanilla note, lots of butter content and gives a rich-thick mouthfeel.

Double Chocolate Clear is artificial and not that good but here fits quite well as a sweet chocolate but Sweet Cream turns it into something better.

Fw Hazelnut is the best.
Has some kind of creaminess and infuses its flavour perfectly into the cream, as well as a malty note that comes really handy in this recipe.

Add 0.5 super sweet to make it closer to the real thing.
